maqras.text: Adam ke bacchon, kya maine tumko hidayat na ki thai ke shaytaan ki bandagi na karo, woh tumhara khula dushman hai
Aur meri hi bandagi karo, yeh seedha raasta hai
Magar iske bawajood usne tum mein se ek giroh-e-kaseer (great multitude of you) ko gumraah kardiya, kya tum aqal nahin rakhte thay
Yeh wahi jahannum hai jissey tumko daraya jata raha tha
Jo kufr tum duniya mein karte rahey ho uski padaish mein ab iska indhan (fuel) bano
Aaj hum inke mooh bandh kiye detey hain, inke haath humse bolenge aur inke paon gawahi denge ke yeh duniya mein kya kamayi karte rahey hain
Hum chahein to inki aankhein moond dein(obliterated their eyes), phir yeh raastey ki taraf lapak kar dekhein, kahan se inhein raasta sujhayi dega
Hum chahein to inhein inki jagah hi par is taraf maskh (transform) karke rakh dein ke yeh na aagey chal sakein na peechey palat sakein
Jis shaks ko hum lambi umar dete hain iski saakht ko hum ulat hi dete hain (we reverse in creation), kya (yeh halaat dekh kar) inhein aqal nahin aati
Humne is (Nabi) ko sher nahin sikhaya hai aur na shayari isko zeib hi deti hai, yeh to ek naseehat hai aur saaf padhi janey wali kitaab
Taa-ke woh har us shaks ko khabardar karde jo zinda ho aur inkar karne walon par hujjat qayam ho jaye
Kya yeh log dekhte nahin hain ke humne apne haathon ki banayi hui cheezon mein se inke liye maweshi paida kiye aur ab yeh inke maalik hain
Humne unhein is tarah inke bas mein kardiya hai ke unmein se kisi par yeh sawaar hotey hain, kisika yeh gosht khate hain
Aur unke andar inke liye tarah tarah ke fawaid (benefits) aur mashrubaat (drinks) hain phir kya yeh shukar guzar nahin hotay
Yeh sabkuch hotey huey inhon ne Allah ke siwa dusre khuda bana liye hain aur yeh umeed rakhte hain ke inki madad ki jayegi
Woh inki koi madad nahin kar sakte balke yeh log ultey unke liye hazir-baash lashkar (army in waiting ) baney huey hain
Accha, jo baatein yeh bana rahey hain woh tumhein ranjeeda na karein, inki chupi aur khuli sab baaton ko hum jaante hain
Kya Insaan dekhta nahin hai ke humne usey nutfe(sperm drop) se paida kiya aur phir woh sareeh jhagdalu bankar khada ho gaya
Ab woh humpar misalein chaspan karta hai aur apni paidaish ko bhool jaata hai , kehta hai “kaun in haddiyon ko zinda karega jabke yeh boseeda (rotten) ho chuki hon?”
Ussey kaho,inhein wahi zinda karega jisne pehle inhein paida kiya tha, aur woh takhleeq (creation) ka har kaam jaanta hai
Wahi jisne tumhare liye harey bharey (green) darakht se aag paida kardi aur tum ussey apne chuleh (stoves) roshan karte ho
Kya woh jisne aasmaano aur zameen ko paida kiya ispar qadir nahin hai ke in jaison ko paida kar sakey? Kyun nahin, jabke woh maahir khallaq (superb creator) hai
Woh to jab kisi cheez ka irada karta hai to uska kaam bas yeh hai ke usey hukum de ke hoja aur woh jo jati hai
Paak hai woh jiske haath mein har cheez ka mukammal iqtedar (full control) hai, aur usi ki taraf tum paltaye janey waale ho
Qataar dar qataar saff baandhne walon ki kasam
Phir unki kasam jo daatne phatkaar ne waley hain
Phir unki kasam jo kalaam e naseehat sunane waley hain
Tumhara mabood e haqiqi bas ek hi hai
Woh jo zameen aur aasmaano ka aur tamaam un cheezon ka maalik hai jo zameen o aasmaan mein hain, aur saarey mashrikon(easts) ka maalik
Humne aasmaan e duniya ko taaron ki zeenat se aarasta (adorn) kiya hai
Aur har shaytan sarkash se isko mehfooz kardiya hai
Yeh shayateen mala-e-aala (High Council) ki baatein nahin sun saktey, har taraf se maarey aur haankey jatey hain
Aur inke liye paiham azaaab hai
Taaham agar koi inmein se kuch ley uday to ek teiz shola uska peecha karta hai
Ab insey pucho, inki paidaish zyada mushkil hai ya un cheezon ki jo humne paida kar rakkhi hain? Inko to humne leis daar gaaray(sticky clay/chickni mitti) se paida kiya hai
Tum (Allah ki qudrat ke karishmon par) hairan ho aur yeh iska mazaak uda rahey hain
Samjhaya jaata hai to samajh kar nahin detey
Koi nishani dekhte hain to usey thatton (mazaak/mock) mein udatey hain
Aur kehte hain “ yeh to sareeh jaadu hai
Bhala kahin aisa ho sakta hai ke jab hum mar chuke hon aur mitti ban jayein aur haddiyon ka panjar reh jaye us waqt hum phir zinda karke utha khade kiye jayein
Aur kya hamare agle waqton ke aaba o ajdaad bhi uthaye jayenge?”
(insey kaho haan, aur tum) khuda ke muqable mein baybas ho
Bas ek hi jhidki hogi aur yakayak yeh apni aankhon se (woh sab kuch jiski khabar di jaa rahi hai) dekh rahey hongey
Us waqt yeh kahengey “ haaye hamari kambakhti , yeh to yaum ul jaza hai”
“yeh wahi faisley ka din hai jisey tum jhutlaya karte thay”
